text: Dumb and Dumber is a 1994 American comedy road movie. This movie is about two men who are roommates and best friends. They live in Providence, Rhode Island and drive to Aspen, Colorado. Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels play the roommates. Lauren Holly plays Mary. Teri Garr plays Helen. The movie was released on December 16, 1994 by Warner Bros. The reviews it received were very good. The movie was a box office success. A prequel, Dumb and Dumberer, was released in 2003. A sequel, Dumb and Dumber To, was released in 2014, In 2023, Dumb and Dumber 3 was reportedly in the works. == Other websites == * Category:1994 comedy movies Category:1990s buddy movies Category:1990s road movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American road movies Category:Comedy road movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies set in Rhode Island Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Providence, Rhode Island Category:Rhode Island in fiction
title: Dumb and Dumber
